name: Horror Grandma House Survival
description:
You’re locked in your evil psycho grandma’s house and all you need is to escape being safe and sound! Check your surviving skills with our new Horror Grandma House Survival app and solve all the terrifying puzzles of this game! Find the keys, fuel the car, start the engine and try to avoid awful meetings with this old crazy lady!

Horror Grandma House Survival features:
• Scary old grandma’s house atmosphere
• She’s blind, bet she can hear your steps
• Use various boosters to avoid dangerous situations
• Find all the keys to go away
• Be as quiet as a mouse
• Escape this old-fashioned 3D place

Download our new Horror Grandma House Survival game and do everything possible to escape from this crazy grandma’s mansion!
